paper_abstract: In this paper, the global mu-stability is investigated for the complex-valued neural networks with leakage time delay and unbounded time-varying delays. The activation functions considered are no longer required to be derivable. By constructing appropriate Lyapunov-Krasovskii functionals and taking advantage of the free weighting matrix method, several sufficient and delay-dependent criteria are established to ensure the global mu-stability of the complex-valued neural networks, which can be easily checked by the Matlab Toolbox. Finally, three numerical examples are provided to illustrate the effectiveness of our theoretical results. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Global mu-stability of complex-valued delayed neural networks with leakage delay
